title: Regarding the Kayle Skin
body: is the date going to be pushed back further? I've received the icon but no skin :(

replies.body: I looked into this for you and see that you've already received the anniversary icon 4 days ago, and Riot Kayle was added on the 14th.  If you don't see the icon, scroll down a bit as it's not really sorted by date acquired.  Everything looks okay!

I do not have Riot Kayle in my skin I can provide a screen shot is you need one.

Edit: I do have the Icon just for clarity. Just not the skin :(
FeelsSSGman

According to the banner on the [support page](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us), the gifts are still being distributed. If you don't receive by the end of the 30th, you can submit a support ticket.
